document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Florida Community Bank Names Paul Jessen as Senior Vice President, Middle Market Relationship Manager
document.topic_text: Florida Community Bank Names Paul Jessen as Senior Vice President, Middle Market Relationship Manager Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 42 minutes ago ) WESTON, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Florida Community Bank Financial Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: FCB), is pleased to announce the hire of Paul Jessen as Senior Vice President – Middle Market Relationship Manager. Jessen will be based out of the Winter Park branch and will be responsible for generating new commercial and industrial loans and treasury management relationships with Florida-based companies and organizations. Jessen’s appointment adds to the expansion of FCB’s Commercial Lending team, while su
document.post: Florida Community Bank Names Paul Jessen as Senior Vice President, Middle Market Relationship Manager Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 42 minutes ago ) WESTON, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Florida Community Bank Financial Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: FCB), is pleased to announce the hire of Paul Jessen as Senior Vice President – Middle Market Relationship Manager. Jessen will be based out of the Winter Park branch and will be responsible for generating new commercial and industrial loans and treasury management relationships with Florida-based companies and organizations.
